channel.title: Abouts on Huabing Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Huabing Blog

item.description: 关于我 Hi，我是赵化冰，服务网格技术布道者及实践者，腾讯云工程师，曾担任中兴通讯技术专家，Linux 基金会开源项目 ONAP 项目 leader，甲骨文

About Me Huabing Zhao is a software architect, an Istio Member and an ONAP PTL. He has a solid experience in the information and telecommunication technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country software systems, most of them are still running in production. He loves open source and has been contributing to various open source projects, he is a member
